thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoilers: Horror for Tracy Barlow as Amy goes missing

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Coronation Street spoilers: Horror for Tracy Barlow as Amy goes missing
text:
(Picture: ITV) Tracy Barlow is set to be thrown into a panic in upcoming Coronation Street scenes as her daughter Amy goes missing while the family is in turmoil following a series of rows. But just where has Amy got to – and might she be up to something? 
With tensions at boiling point for the Barlows, Tracy is already annoyed that she and her daughter have been seemingly pushed out by Ken, who is focusing on the issues raised by his blood relatives. When he also refuses to lend Tracy the funds to buy the premises for the flower shop, she is even more disheartened and she and Amy are still smarting from overhearing him slate his life with Deirdre recently.
(Picture: ITV) With Ken’s words having clearly affected Amy, she disappears from her violin recital, citing stage fright. As a panicked Tracy and Luke search everywhere for the youngster, their fears grow but as she slinks into No.1 and is caught by Ken in the front room, what is she doing that requires her to be so sneaky?
(Picture: ITV) And, as further rows kick off in the Barlow household, will the rifts grow even more?
Coronation Street airs these scenes on Monday 27th March at 7:30pm and 8:30pm. 
MORE: 10 reasons why the resurgence of the Barlows in Coronation Street is one of soap’s biggest triumphs
